item.title: You Can Now Hire a Hollywood Filmmaker to Shoot Your Next Vacation
item.description:
You Can Now Hire a Hollywood Filmmaker to Shoot Your Next Vacation

Filmmaker Tim Browning has worked on the set of countless big-budget blockbusters- Star Wars: The Force Awakens, Skyfall, Spectre-but now he's setting his sights on more personal projects. He has signed on as the exclusive drone photographer for bespoke travel outfitter Black Tomato, a job that will have him crisscrossing the globe filming travelers from the skies.

item.title: Wine Press: 2 delightful roses, including one from Lebanon, perfect for summer
item.description:
Wine Press: 2 delightful roses, including one from Lebanon, perfect for summer

A picnic this weekend reminded me just how perfect Rose wines can be on a warm, summer night. A few months ago, I recommended several, dry Rose wines in two different wine columns - one devoted to Rose wines from France, the other devoted to Rose wines from around the world.

item.title: Northern California wine grapes exposed to smoke from Soberanes Fire; wine to taste 'differently'
item.description:
Northern California wine grapes exposed to smoke from Soberanes Fire; wine to taste 'differently'

CARMEL, Calif., Aug. 9 (UPI) -- Twelve wineries' grapes are being exposed to heavy smoke from the Soberanes Fire, which has burned more than 67,092 acres north of Northern California's Big Sur in Carmel Valley. The grapes are close to ripening as they undergo veraison -- changing color, Monterey County Vintners and Growers Association executive director Kim Stemler said.

item.title: Mexico Has Its Own Wine Country-And It's Amazing
item.description:
Mexico Has Its Own Wine Country-And It's Amazing

Six hundred miles south of Napa Valley, just past Tijuana, lies a series of lush green vineyards that are turning out some of the world's most exciting New World wines. The main highway is quiet and dusty, and the landscapes are dotted by rock-strewn hillsides and grazing cows.

item.title: Brewers struggle to find pumpkin for this year's fall brews
item.description:

item.title: The Perfect Reuben and Other Ideas for Brunch O'Clock
item.description:
The Perfect Reuben and Other Ideas for Brunch O'Clock

Duck & Waffle is a pioneer of 24-hour dining in London. Several times, I have wandered in at 5 a.m., seeking comfort in a Bloody Mary and Colombian eggs. At that time, the restaurant is relatively quiet. For much of the day and night it is packed and buzzy, and much of the credit for that goes to chef Dan Doherty, 32.
